official_title: Inpatient Capture: a Mixed Methods Study to Develop an Inpatient Lung Cancer Screening Program in a Safety Net Hospital.
inclusion_criteria:
* 50-80 years of age
* greater than or equal to 20 pack year history
* currently smoking or have quit within the last 15 years
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 50 Years
Must have maximum age of 80 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* < 50 years of age, > 80 years of age
* < 20 pack year history
* quit smoking greater than 15 years
